acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Donated by Reggie Qadar, Local 1306 president, on behalf of the American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees (AFSCME), Local 1306, in 2008. The accession number associated with this gift is 1979.003.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees (AFSCME), Local 1306 Records; WAG 209; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This very small collection contains some records of the American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees (AFSCME), DC 37, Local 1306, which represented workers in the American Museum of Natural History. The collection contains correspondence, collective bargaining documents, grievances, and minutes of the local.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright (or related rights to publicity and privacy) for materials in this collection, created by the American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees (AFSCME), Local 1306, was not transferred to New York University. Permission to use materials must be secured from the copyright holder.
